Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity against C. gloeosporioides but not against Botrytis cinerea and Fusarium sp. or against various yeasts. Has no antibacterial activity.

Literature.Title: Identification of a Passiflora alata Curtis dimeric peptide showing identity with 2S albumins.
Literature.Author: Ribeiro SM, Almeida RG, Pereira CA, Moreira JS, Pinto MF, Oliveira AC, Vasconcelos IM, Oliveira JT, Santos MO, Dias SC, Franco OL.
